components.title: PebbleGo
components.tagline:
Where K-2 kids go to make sense
of the world around them
components.description:
Thousands of standards-aligned, nonfiction articles
designed to be understood by early elementary learners.

components.tagline: K-2 kids are curious about the world, where can they go to explore it?

components.text:
Your K-2 kids have questions about the world. Questions about their latest favorite animal, somehow even more obscure than the last (what do axolotls eat for breakfast?), and important-but-trickier questions like ‘How do I stand up for a friend?’

PebbleGo is the place where kids go to confidently discover the world, and where educators start the valuable work of helping them make sense of it.

components.title: For Kids
components.description: PebbleGo provides a whole world of information specifically designed to be relevant and engaging for kids, making it the perfect place for independent exploration.

components.title: For Educators
components.description: PebbleGo is a crucial starting point for student inquiry and discovery, a place where they can confidently introduce a new topic, trusting that all the information has been designed to be understood by K-2 kids.

components.title: What else can PebbleGo do for you?
components.description1: Make it easy to introduce new terms and concepts.
components.description2: Equip upper elementary learners for deeper, independent exploration.
components.description3: Bring academic concepts to life through the power of story.
components.description4: Provide a creative space for planning lessons and demonstrating learning.
